perturbation.original_text: 4.1 MANAGING DIRECTOR. The Franchisee shall, subject to BKC's approval, appoint an individual as the "Managing Director" who shall be responsible for the overall management of the Franchisee. The Managing Director and Director of Operations may be the same individual.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1 MANAGING DIRECTOR. The Franchisee shall, subject to BKC's approval, appoint an individual as the "Managing Director" who shall be responsible for some administrative tasks of the Franchisee. The Managing Director and Director of Operations must be different individuals.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text creates a contradiction by stating that the Managing Director is only responsible for 'some administrative tasks' versus the original 'overall management'. Also, it contradicts by saying that The Managing Director and Director of Operations 'must be different individuals.'

perturbation.original_text: 5.2 THE MOD MANUAL. The MOD Manual shall be kept at the Franchised Restaurant and all changes or additions shall be inserted upon receipt. The Franchisee agrees that changes in standards, specifications and procedures may become necessary and desirable from time to time and shall comply with such modifications, revisions and additions to the MOD Manual as BKC in the good faith exercise of its judgment believes to be desirable. The information 5 contained in the MOD Manual is confidential and the Franchisee shall use the MOD Manual only in connection with the operation of the Franchised Restaur ant and other licensed Burger King Restaurants
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2 THE MOD Manual. The MOD Manual may be kept at the Franchised Restaurant and all changes or additions is not necessary to be inserted upon receipt. The Franchisee can choose to follow changes in standards, specifications and procedures if they believe is desirable. The information 5 contained in the MOD Manual is public information and the Franchisee can use the MOD Manual for any purposes.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction because, the original texts says 'The MOD Manual shall be kept at the Franchised Restaurant', whereas the changed text says 'The MOD Manual may be kept at the Franchised Restaurant'. The same logic applied for other phrases of the texts

perturbation.original_text: 8.1 PRE-OPENING TRAINING. Before the Franchised Restaurant opens, the Director of Operations and such members of the Franchisee's staff charged with the responsibility for the day to day operation of the Franchised Restaurant as BKC may determine must have successfully completed BKC's training program at such location in the U.S. or elsewhere as may be designated by BKC. Such members of t e Franchisee's restaurant staff as BKC may determine shall undertake and complete continuing raining programs from time to time as may be directed by BKC in order to implement current operational standards.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1 PRE-OPENING TRAINING. Before the Franchised Restaurant opens, the Managing Director is not required to complete BKC's training program. The Franchisee's staff might not need to complete continuing training programs.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction because, the original texts says that 'the Director of Operations and such members of the Franchisee's staff charged with the responsibility for the day to day operation of the Franchised Restaurant as BKC may determine must have successfully completed BKC's training program', whereas the changed text says 'the Managing Director is not required to complete BKC's training program' and 'The Franchisee's staff might not need to complete continuing training programs.'
